short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An tool that allows users to easily connect AI to their webpages, providing chat and information retrieval capabilities.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Please note that this is still an early test version. Iâ€™m dedicating about 10% of my work time to maintain it, so it may not be fully polished yet. Thank you for your patience and understanding!

Product Features:

1.	Protocol Support: The product currently supports OpenAI-compatible protocol formats and offers a free trial API provided by SiliconFlow for users to explore its features.
2.	Custom Prompts: Enables setting commonly used prompts, with support for including page elements such as title names, page content, and selected text as variables within prompts. This allows for a highly customizable query experience.
3.	Open Source: Our project is open source! We warmly welcome contributions from anyone interested in joining and helping us improve the product. https://github.com/askman-dev/askman-chrome-extension

These features are designed to enhance your browsing experience, offering more convenient and flexible access to information. Thank you for your support during this testing phase!

# v0.0.6 Updates
- Support for maximizing the chat interface
- Added Preferences tab in Options page with TOML configuration support
  - Configurable user language (default: English)
  - Toggle for ASK button on text selection (default: disabled)
  - Configurable page blocklist for ASK button
- Added message copy functionality
  - Fade-in copy button on hover
  - Copy messages in markdown format
- Added content preview on Selection tab hover
